""" Check onion_bordas inverse transform() 'curve A'
    """
delta = 0.01
rl = np.arange(0, 0.5 + delta / 2, delta)
rr = np.arange(0.5 + delta, 1.0, delta)
r = np.concatenate((rl, rr), axis=0)
orig = np.concatenate((f(rl), f(rr)), axis=0)
proj = np.concatenate((g(rl), g(rr)), axis=0)
recon = abel.onion_bordas.onion_bordas_transform(proj, r[1] - r[0],
    direction='inverse')
ratio = orig[20] / recon[20]
assert_allclose(orig, recon * ratio, rtol=0, atol=0.1)
